summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East John Street, in the City of Seattle, from Belmont Avenue North to Boylston Avenue North, by constructing concrete sidewalks therein, in accordance with Resolution No. 481 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," under the provision of Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899.
